description: This file implements the TokenClient class, which interacts with a gRPC-based token service to obtain platform and authentication tokens. It includes methods for creating secure/insecure channels, setting deadlines, and making RPC calls with proper metadata and timeout handling.

classes.name: TokenClient
classes.description: A client class for communicating with a gRPC token service to retrieve platform and auth tokens, supporting TLS and timeout configurations.

methods.name: void ApplyDeadline(grpc::ClientContext & ctx,const uint32_t grpcTimeoutMs)
methods.description: Sets the deadline for a gRPC client context based on a timeout value.

methods.name: std::shared_ptr<grpc::Channel> CreateChannel(const std::string & endpoint,const bool useTls,const uint32_t idleTimeoutMs)
methods.description: Creates and returns a gRPC channel with optional TLS and idle timeout settings.

methods.name: bool GetPlatformToken(const std::string & appId,const std::string & xact,const std::string & sat,std::string & outToken,uint32_t & outExpiresIn,std::string & errMsg)
methods.description: Requests a platform token from the server, handling request setup, metadata, and response parsing.

methods.name: bool GetAuthToken(const std::string & appId,const std::string & sat,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & sct,std::string & outToken,uint32_t & outExpiresIn,std::string & errMsg)
methods.description: Requests an auth token with optional partnerId and sct, handling setup, metadata, and response parsing.

methods.name: TokenClient(const std::string & endpoint,const bool useTls,const uint32_t grpcTimeoutMs,const uint32_t idleTimeoutMs)

ctags.signature: (const std::string & endpoint,const bool useTls,const uint32_t idleTimeoutMs)

ctags.signature: (const std::string & appId,const std::string & xact,const std::string & sat,std::string & outToken,uint32_t & outExpiresIn,std::string & errMsg)
